name: mega-glasses
effect: Unused.  This is Maxie's Key Stone in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire, but it cannot be obtained by the player.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
These glasses contain an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
These glasses contain an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.

These glasses contain an untold power that
somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
to Mega Evolve in battle.

somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone
